qas.question: What percentage of the population is Christian?
What percentage of the population continues to hold indigenous beliefs?
What forms of Islamic and Christian faiths do many residents practice?
What do many residents combine with Islamic and Christian practices?

context: <a0_0>Approximately 10%<a0_0/> of the country's population belong to the Christian community, and <a1_0>40%<a1_0/> continue to hold Indigenous beliefs. These statistics can be misleading, however, as many residents practice <a2_0>syncretic<a2_0/> forms of Islamic and Christian faiths, combining their practices with <a3_0>traditional African beliefs<a3_0/>.
